channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Two pot hole in excess of 10cm deep and 20cm wide, 22nd January
item.description:
Width and depth of pothole in vehicle track width is excessive and a significant safety hazard to all two wheel vehicles and they are causing drivers to take avoid steer actions to avoid.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The estate is not cleaned properly, 22nd January
item.description:
The cleaner didn’t even enter the green spaces full of trash. Please address asap.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 28, 22nd January

This pothole has been getting larger and the grit kicked up damages cars parked close by.

item.title: Unsafe areas where children climb and play, 22nd January
item.description:
I was not happy with my granddaughters playing in Danson park there are so many areas of broken equipment or equipment with bits missing!! The whole playground needs attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Park, Welling, Greater London

item.category: Street cleaning - Grass verges / Shrub beds - Littering

item.title: New light is far too bright, 22nd January
item.description:
A new lamp has been installed on the rear of the raised flats, above the undercroft area and opposite the tall street lamp. It’s a very bright cold white light without a diffuser or cover. It shines a harsh and unpleasant light into my rear bedrooms at night - a neighbour described it as like having car headlights shining through their blinds all night. Please either replace it with a softer, warmer light like the neighbouring ones or remove it altogether - this area is already over lit.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Combe Mews, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged Tree, 22nd January
item.description:

item.title: Lights out, 22nd January
